page.title: 18ARTS & CRAFTS
page.content: There are many clever and artistic people in Burton who excel in various arts and crafts. There are a number of {painters} using oils, water-colours, charcoal and other media. The late Mrs Bessie Tapsell taught some people how to make 3-dimensional pictures using fine nylon and silk materials and embroidery stitches. She called this form of art,{Ethereal.} Several people enjoy showing their skills in{pottery, exhibiting in the local show in August.{ Photography} has become a popular hobby, a few villagers belonging to Bentham Photographic Society. Our village has a number of people interested ( and talented ) in {flower - arranging,} displaying their skills by competing and making a colourful contribution to local flower shows.
